entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as being given top-grade security status.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: A person who is driving Harry and his family to a destination, mentioned as saying 'Don't get used to it'.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: The wife of Mr. Weasley, mentioned as being in the front seat with her husband.

entities.name: ministry driver
entities.description: A person who is driving Harry and his family to a destination, mentioned as saying 'Here you are, then'.

entities.name: harry's invisibility cloak
entities.description: An object that Harry has stowed in his backpack, mentioned as being good enough for Dumbledore.

entities.name: leaky cauldron
entities.description: A location where additional security will be joining up with Harry and his family.

relationships.description: The Ministry driver is driving Harry to a destination, as mentioned in the text.
Mr. Weasley and Mrs. Weasley are married, as implied by their being together in the front seat.
Harry will be joining up with additional security at the Leaky Cauldron, as mentioned by Mr. Weasley.
